com.netscape.certsrv.authority

Interface ICertAuthority

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAuthority, ISubsystem

    public interface ICertAuthority
extends IAuthority
    Authority that handles certificates needed by the cert registration servlets.

    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
